\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: The @'Stride.Graphics.GraphicsDevice' class is the central class for displaying your game.
A classe @'Stride.Graphics.GraphicsDevice é a classe central para exibir seu jogo.
The @'Stride.Graphics.GraphicsDevice' class is the central class for displaying your game.
It's used to create resources and present images on the screen.
É usado para criar recursos e apresentar imagens na tela.
It's used to create resources and present images on the screen.
You can access it as a member of the @'Stride.Engine.Game' and @'Stride.Engine.ScriptComponent' classes.
Você pode acessá-lo como um membro do @'Stride. Engine.Game' e @'Stride.Engine.ScriptComponent' classes.
You can access it as a member of the @'Stride.Engine.Game' and @'Stride.Engine.ScriptComponent' classes.
Actions such as drawing, setting graphics states and using resources are recorded using @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList' objects for later execution by the device.
Ações como desenho, definição de estados gráficos e utilização de recursos são gravadas usando objetos @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList para posterior execução pelo dispositivo.
Actions such as drawing, setting graphics states and using resources are recorded using @'Stride.Graphics.CommandList' objects for later execution by the device.
Many command lists can be filled at the same time (eg one per thread).
Muitas listas de comando podem ser preenchidas ao mesmo tempo (por exemplo, uma por linha).
Many command lists can be filled at the same time (eg one per thread).
A default command list is available as member of the @'Stride.Games.GameBase.GraphicsContext' of your @'Stride.Engine.Game'.
Uma lista de comandos padrão está disponível como membro do @'Stride.Games.GameBase.GraphicsContext' do seu @'Stride. Motor. Jogo.
A default command list is available as member of the @'Stride.Games.GameBase.GraphicsContext' of your @'Stride.Engine.Game'.
In methods, these objects are typically provided through contexts such as @'Stride.Rendering.RenderContext' and @'Stride.Rendering.RenderDrawContext'.
Em métodos, esses objetos são normalmente fornecidos através de contextos como @'Stride. Renderização. RenderContext' e @'Stride.Rendering.RenderDrawContext'.
In methods, these objects are typically provided through contexts such as @'Stride.Rendering.RenderContext' and @'Stride.Rendering.RenderDrawContext'.
Performing any drawing requires multiple steps, including:
Executar qualquer desenho requer vários passos, incluindo:
Performing any drawing requires multiple steps, including:
setting textures as <g1>render textures</g1>, clearing them, and setting viewports and scissors
definindo texturas como <g1>render texturas</g1>, clarificá-las e definir viewports e tesouras
setting textures as <g1>render textures</g1>, clearing them, and setting viewports and scissors
setting up the graphics <g1>pipeline state</g1>, including input description, shaders, depth-stencil, blending, rasterizer, etc
configurando os gráficos <g1>pipeline state</g1>, incluindo descrição de entrada, shaders, profundidade-stencil, mistura, rasterizer, etc
setting up the graphics <g1>pipeline state</g1>, including input description, shaders, depth-stencil, blending, rasterizer, etc
binding <g1>resources</g1>, such as constant buffers and textures
vinculação <g1>recursos</g1>, como amortecedores e texturas constantes
binding <g1>resources</g1>, such as constant buffers and textures
<g1>drawing vertices</g1> using built-in primitives or custom vertex buffers
<g1> desenho vértices</g1> usando primitivos incorporados ou tampões de vértice personalizados
<g1>drawing vertices</g1> using built-in primitives or custom vertex buffers
